title: Controlling the download of emails from server
content:
Until recently, I've been using Windows Live Mail on a Windows 7 computer. When its Pop 3 download ability stopped working, I started looking for another email program that could read my Windows Mail emails on my computer while continuing to download more recent emails to save on my computer. Thunderbird seemed like it might be the answer. Unfortunately, much to my horror, Thunderbird is in the process of re-downloading everything from my online server back to 1998. I had to close Thunderbird to avoid needless duplication of the emails I already have on my computer. I'm using Thunderbird's IMAP, but after reading various help online articles, it sounds as though the POP3 has the same problem, that you can't configure either Thunderbird protocol to restrict its download to a few months in history without either deleting all of the old emails on the online server, downloading just the headers without the body of the email for past and future email downloads, or restrict the length of time an email remains in either the computer or online systems. I'm very confused by all of these articles, rendering me unable to make a move-- I can't afford to lose almost 3 decades of emails on my online server.

All I want to do is find a program that will pick up where Windows Mail left off, something that downloads the current emails to my computer while leaving the online emails unaltered. Is there anyway I can get Thunderbird to do this? Thanks.
creator: dangheno

title: I have thunderbird installed on my windows 10 laptop and suddenly I can't send emails.

title: Server Settings for bigpond.com
content: Hi, Hoping someone can help. [rather a long story sorry] I have been using Thunderbird for a long time and was working OK until last week, then suddenly I can no longer log in, after a lot of hours on telstra help[which was no help] except to say that my bigpond.com was linked to my ex-partners account which was opened probably 20 yrs ago, i never remember having a password, and T/B was asking for that, in the end I went to a Telstra Shop and got my ex to be there as well as they couldn't do anything without him being there. Everything seemed to be going fine and got the bigpond account in my name with a new password, I even got them to help me install a mail program on my phone through gmail.....all good got some emails. On arriving home very relieved switched on my computer and downloaded some mail, then wanted to download TB on my phone which I did and tried to set it up, but couldn't get it to work......now I'm not sure what's wrong but read about having to have the correct server address and port number as I wanted to be able to sync from mobile to desktop and vice versa......so now I don't know which server and port number are correct.....so to cut the long story short I'm hoping someone can help with setup and server and Port numbers for old bigpond accounts and if they are are same on Mobile and Computer. Thanks if you read to the end :-) Sandra
creator: sandyg23

title: Sending of S/MIME message failed.
content:
Hi All. New to Thunderbird but liking what I see. Am trying to install a new certificate but keep seeing the same error message when I attempt to send an email:

Sending of the message failed. You specified that this message should be digitally signed, but the application either failed to find the signing certificate specified in your Mail & Newsgroup Account Settings, or the certificate has expired.

So here is what we know:

The certificate seems to work (I've sent test emails to a couple of test email accounts) when I use it in Outlook safe mode. Can't get it to work in normal Outlook mode because of add-ins, hence my switch to Thunderbird. They seem to appear fine in the S/MIME section for digital signing and encryption and I can even see the certificate when I go into Manage S/MIME Certificates.

Has anyone come across this before / got any ideas about how to resolve this? Thanks!!
creator: colinmcgrath1882

title: Address book no longer accessible
content:
My address book appears to be inaccessible. There are no contacts shown and new contacts and address books can't be added. The same is true if I delete the address book files from my profile and restart TB. I'm on TB version 143.0.1 and my profile is on a NAS server. This has worked for many years and broke only very recently. If I use a local profile, the address book works.

The error console shows a variety of errors:

IndexedDB UnknownErr: ActorsParent.cpp:585

services.settings: UnknownError: IndexedDB: thunderbird/moz-essential-domain-fallbacks getLastModified() IndexedDB: The operation failed for reasons unrelated to the database itself and not covered by any other error code.

NS_ERROR_STORAGE_IOERR: Component returned failure code: 0x80630002 (NS_ERROR_STORAGE_IOERR) [mozIStorageConnection.executeSimpleSQL]

NS_ERROR_FAILURE: No directory for uri=jsaddrbook://abook.sqlite

title: ho creato un nuovo calendario da un account di Aruba, appare il pulsante "ATTIVA"
content:
in Italiano: Ciao, ho creato un calendario per sincronizzare thunderbird ad un account di Aruba. - Mi appare il pulsante ATTIVA riportato nell'immagine 133 e il cerchio di fianco al nome del calendario è vuoto. - Se clicco su pulsante ATTIVA si apre la finestra dell'immagine 135, - se metto il FLAG su "Attiva questo calendario", appena clicco su "OK" il flag viene tolto automaticamente Come posso risolvere ?

In English: Hi, I created a calendar to sync Thunderbird to an Aruba account. - The ACTIVATE button shown in image 133 appears, and the circle next to the calendar name is empty. - If I click the ACTIVATE button, the window shown in image 135 opens. - If I flag "Activate this calendar," the flag is automatically removed as soon as I click "OK." How can I fix this?

title: Blocking ALL unknown senders - If they are not in my contact list, their spam gets deleted.
content:
I don't want to go with any more clicking spam emails as spam BS.

I don't want any more junk email filters and all that crap.

I want a universal block, that deletes all incoming messages, from spammers and unknown senders, who are NOT already in my contact list.

You know I send some one an email and they are NOW in my contact list.

So they can reply.

But if they are NOT in my contact list, they are spammers.

I do not want to be forever clowning around with deleting the spam from scam artists.

If it's an unknown sender, I want them automatically blocked and deleted.

I am pushing this in gmail too, and now in Thunderbird.

Thanks in advance.

title: Can’t Add Yahoo Account to Thunderbird
content:
Hello,

After moving to a new PC and installing the latest version of Thunderbird, I’m unable to add my long-standing Yahoo Mail account which had been working flawlessly in TB for nearly 20 years.

Here’s what I’ve tried so far:

Followed the official Thunderbird and Yahoo help documentation

Tried various community/AI suggestions

Generated and used a Yahoo application password

Thunderbird gets stuck at the “Your full name, email address” step and does not proceed to request a password. It also no longer shows the option to configure the account manually.

Has anyone else experienced this issue, and is there a workaround to force manual account setup or bypass this initial block?

Thanks in advance for your help,

Bertrand

title: Thunderbird に対する「ユーザー名」とは？
content:
皆様、はじめまして。 先日、ThunderbirdにGmailアドレスも追加登録しました。 が、パスワード変更が必要になった為、Google で Gmail のパスワードを変更した後に、Thunderbirdに登録しているGmailアドレスでは受送信出来なくなりました。 従ってThunderbird での Gmail送信エラー画面でパスワードを変更しようとしたのですが「新しいパスワードを入力」への入力を受け付けてくれませんでした。 更にパスワードリストで変更出来るかとリストを出そうとしましたら、Thunderbirdがユーザー名とパスワードを聞いてきました。 でも、ThunderbirdはＰＣが変わっても、ダウンロード、インストールさせて頂くだけで、メールアドレス等の設定をすれば使えますので、敢えてユーザー名やパスワードを登録した記憶がございません？

結局、「その他」を選んだらPINを入れることによってパスワードは見られたのですが。 後でパスワードマネージャーのリストを見てもThunderbird は載っていませんでした。じゃあ、パスワードマネージャーは何というユーザー名を入れたのか？判らず気になります💦

Thunderbird が「メールアドレスのユーザー名」でなく？、単に「ユーザー名」と聞いてきた場合、何を入力すれば良いのでしょう？ 登録した複数のメールアドレスの中のどれかを入力すれば良かったのでしょうか？

その後、Googleから本人確認をしてきましたので、Gmailのパスワードを入れ、スマホで「はい、私です」をクリックしたら、ThunderbirdでもGmailの受送信が出来るようにはなりました。

ただ、もし、Thunderbird ソフトに対するユーザー名とパスワードがあるのなら、なんとかしないといけませんので、お尋ねしております。（初めてThunderbird を使わせていただいた頃のメールアドレスはスパムの為に削除して無くなっております。）

よろしくお願いいたします。m(__)m
creator: sapphy123
